About The Creator

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I am doing...

Aadya Garg

My name is Aadya Garg, I am a passionate 16 year old who wants to understand and make sense of how the world works. It’s rules, expectations, insecurities, it’s challenges. I like to question the society’s gender norms and expectations. Even though I am shy in nature I like to stand out of the ordinary and make change. I am a proud and happy Feminist and strongly believe in gender equality. I want to make a difference even if it is a small one. I believe every step counts no matter it’s scale. With the help of the website FEMEQUALITY I aspire to inspire not only young girls but girls, women and men of all ages to stand up for women and their rights. I want to help break stereotypes and social stigmas regarding gender. The world might never be perfect but it can become better with your actions and Ideas, Become a part of this website and join me to make a difference!!!
